stadium.name: The Unruly Yard
stadium.description: A field in the center of the city's most rebellious district. The stadium is covered in graffiti, the crowd is hostile, and riots are a common post-game (and mid-game) event.

stats.pregame_ritual: Drinking a shot of hot gravy from a dented tin cup.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Testing the heft of their weapon with a series of slow, deliberate swings.
Kissing the Trollball on its stitched 'nose'.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Refusing to step on any lines on the field before the whistle blows.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.

stadium.name: Fletchings Field
stadium.description: Fletchings Field was the first formal Troll Ball stadium in Warden lands. The design balances wood and stone, with arrowhead motifs and banners representing each region under Warden protection. The field includes trees, gully's and other obstacle placements, changed each match by local druids and terrain crafters.

stats.pregame_ritual: Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Burying their helmet in the ground and then digging it back up.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Always putting on their left gauntlet before their right.

preGame:
# ‚öæ STEP UP TO THE PLATE, OSTERRA! GAME FOUR IS LIVE! ‚öæ

Hello, you beautiful, bloodthirsty bunch! It's your favorite voice of the void, Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live from the most wonderfully dilapidated spot in New Monteforte‚Äî**The Unruly Yard**! We are at the absolute edge of history tonight, folks! The Chaos Creatures are sitting on a 2-1 lead in this Best of 5 series. If the rebels win tonight, the crown is theirs! But if the leafy 'heroes' of Oak & Onslaught can find some grit, we're going to a Game Five! üèüÔ∏è

I just peeked into the dugouts, and the rituals are in full swing! **Mouldon Earl** of the Chaos Creatures is currently hopping around like a nervous toad, refusing to step on a single line on the field before the whistle! On the other side, **Hole Bowerman** is elbow-deep in the mud, burying her helmet to appease the earth spirits. I hope those spirits like the taste of cheap steel and Warden sweat! And let's not forget **Normi Glaudia**, who is once again sporting his boots on the wrong feet for 'luck.' Tactical brilliance or just a lack of basic literacy? You be the judge! ü©≤üå∞

The popularity of these Oak & Onslaught rangers is truly nauseating‚Äîthe stands are packed with Warden fans wearing those ridiculous feathered caps! But here in the Yard, the graffiti is fresh, the **Unstable Scaffolding** is swaying like a drunken sailor, and the **Rowdy Crowd** is ready to throw more than just insults! With an **Open Bar** tonight, the beer is flowing faster than blood in a butcher shop! Will **Sir Randy** and his fancy-pants rangers defend their reputation, or will the Monteforte rebels turn this linear field into a graveyard? The blood is pumping, and the whistle is ready to scream! Let‚Äôs play Trollball! üî•üèà
postGame:
# üèÜ THE OAK CRASHES DOWN ON MONTEFORTE! WE ARE TIED AT TWO! üèÜ

Holy Mackerel, sports fans! What a display of absolute, unmitigated savagery! You‚Äôre listening to Nok the Corrupter, and my demonic heart is practically singing after that performance! Oak & Onslaught have roared back with a vengeance, silencing the Unruly Yard with a crushing 6-2 victory! The series is now deadlocked, and we are headed for a winner-take-all Game Five! üèüÔ∏è‚ú®

The game kicked off with **Mouldon Earl** scooping up the troll head, but the Chaos Creatures‚Äô early momentum was as shaky as a rogue's promise. The action really heated up when **Placido Kora** snatched a wild pass from Milt Casady right out of the air! Interception! The crowd went wild, but the 'heroes' weren't about to let the rebels have all the fun in their own backyard! üèàüí•

Chaos drew first blood on the scoreboard when **Alben Diantha** found a pocket of space in the Away Field. He launched a prayer of a shot‚ÄîSWISH‚Äîa massive 2-point Shoot! The scoreboard lit up, and for a fleeting moment, it looked like the Monteforte rebellion was going to sweep the series. Sir Randy must have been clutching his fancy bow in terror while the fans doubled down at the open bar! üéØüç∫

But then, the Oak started to swing back! **Ema Ulrick** found herself in Center Field with a clear line of sight. She didn't hesitate, launching a long-range bomb that sailed through the hoop! That‚Äôs 2 points for the Wardens, tying the game and silencing the street performers in the front row! The momentum was shifting faster than a druid‚Äôs mood! üèÄ‚ú®

Let‚Äôs talk about the hits, because golly, they were delicious! **Tucker Hett** decided **Milt Casady** had been upright for too long and delivered a tackle that sounded like a dry branch snapping under a giant's boot! Milt was sent straight to the healers‚Äîa bone-crunching highlight that had the crowd roaring for more medical bills! üöëü¶¥

Oak & Onslaught took the lead when **Normi Glaudia**, despite having his boots on the wrong feet, found his range! He launched another 2-point Shoot from Center Field, making it 4-2! I suppose when you‚Äôre a 'hero,' the universe rewards your fashion disasters with points. The Wardens were starting to look as immovable as an old oak tree! üéØü§ò

As we hit halftime, the players were looking a bit wobbly. With the **Open Bar** in full effect, **Wolbrom Ariella** was seen swaying almost as much as the unstable scaffolding! Healer **Ahron Latashia** was busier than a one-armed wallpaper hanger, stitching the rangers back together while **Lian Denton** chugged enough gravy to fill a moat! üè•ü•ì

The second half was a literal parade of stretchers! **Hole Bowerman** decided to take revenge for her captain, leveling **Mouldon Earl** with a lance tackle that likely rattled the very foundations of the city! Mouldon was hauled off to the infirmary, proving that the earth spirits really do favor those who bury their gear in the dirt! üöëüî®

The Chaos Creatures tried to rally, but **Gabriele Klehm** decided to pick a fight with **Wynnie Faina**, sending the mace-wielder to the injury list with a crunch that echoed off the graffiti-covered walls! It was a masterpiece of attrition, and my demonic heart was pining for even more fractures! ‚õìÔ∏èüè•

The nail in the coffin came from **Millham Evangeline**. After navigating a sea of tackles and stumbling defenders, Millham launched one final 2-point bomb from the Home Field! Final score: Oak & Onslaught 6, New Monteforte 2! The 'heroes' have forced a Game Five, and the series is tied 2-2! üèÄüèÜ

Chaos had their moments, but the Wardens showed that popularity and fancy weapons actually count for something when the pressure is on. **Abner Seidel** was sent to the healers late by a vicious **Wolbrom Ariella** hit, and **Teria Ravo** followed him shortly after thanks to **Fogel Raynold**, but the points were already in the bag! üè•üí•

So here we are, Osterra! One game remains to decide the absolute champion of the realm! Will the Wardens keep their crown, or will the Chaos Creatures burn the whole forest down in the finale? I‚Äôm betting on the blood! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off from a stadium full of drunk fans and very busy surgeons! Stay violent, sports fans! ü§òüî•
